wikidataquality-desc: Migrate and improve the usage of constraints by visualizing constraint reports and cross-check data with external databases to ensure the quality of Wikidata.
wikidataquality-constraint-instructions: Enter an entity ID and let it be checked against the constraints.
wikidataquality-constraint-instructions-: Try any ID, ideally an item ID, and look at the results.
wikidataquality-crosscheck-instructions: Just enter an entity and let it cross-check against GND.
wikidataquality-crosscheck-instructions-: Try for example Q159099 (Nina Hagen) and look at the results.
apihelp-wdqcrosscheck-description: API module to cross-check entities against external data.
apihelp-wdqcrosscheck-param-entities: Ids of the entities that should be crosschecked.
apihelp-wdqcrosscheck-examples-2: Run cross-check for entity Q76 and Q567.
